about_the_game:
Step in to the grove

Embark on a cozy & relaxing journey through the heart of nature's embrace in Lost Grove, a delightful walking simulator that beckons you to unwind, explore, and savor the simple pleasures of life. Step into a lush, handcrafted world where tranquility reigns supreme, and every corner teems with wonder and discovery.

Features

  • 🌿 A Lush Grove Awaits: Immerse yourself in the heart of a vibrant, handcrafted forest, where every blade of grass, rustling leaf, and glistening stream feels alive.
  • 🌄 Breathtaking Vistas: Take a moment to pause and drink in the breathtaking views. From serene lakeside reflections to majestic mountain vistas, the beauty of Lost Grove is boundless.
  • 🏡 Explore Hidden Gems: Traverse winding paths to stumble upon charming little campsites, quaint cottages, and cozy tents tucked away amidst the trees. Each location tells a unique story and invites you to linger and contemplate.
  • 🎶 Soothing Soundscapes: Let the gentle rustling of leaves and the melodic birdsong lull you into a state of peaceful serenity. The immersive sound design is your companion on this introspective journey.
  • ☕ Relax and Reflect: Embrace the game's cozy, unhurried pace. Sit by the campfire, sip tea on the porch, or just breathe in the fresh, invigorating air. The Lost Grove is your personal oasis of relaxation.

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any DirectX 10 capable graphics card with 1GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Sound Card: Any
